How It Works

Simple steps to transform your hiring. Whether you're a candidate, recruiter, or company, get started in minutes.

For Candidates

Prepare for your dream role with AI-powered mock interviews

01

Sign Up & Choose Role

Create your account and select the job role you're preparing for.

02

Practice with AI

Take mock interviews with our intelligent AI that adapts to your responses.

03

Get Detailed Analysis

Receive comprehensive feedback on your performance and resume.

For Recruiters

Streamline your hiring process with AI-powered screening

01

Post Your Job

Create job postings with customized interview criteria.

02

Share Interview Link

Send unique interview links to candidates for AI screening.

03

Review Analytics

Get detailed reports and rankings for each applicant.

For Companies

Build a unified hiring system across your entire organization

01

Set Up Organization

Create your company profile and configure hiring workflows.

02

Manage Recruiters

Add team members and assign roles with custom permissions.

03

Track Performance

Monitor hiring metrics and analyze team performance.

Frequently Asked Questions

Everything you need to know about IntenX

Unlike traditional video screening, IntenX conducts real, adaptive interviews. The AI asks follow-up questions, probes deeper based on responses, and evaluates skills, communication, and role-fit‚Äîjust like a human interviewer, but faster and bias-aware.

Yes. IntenX is designed to be natural, conversational, and non-intimidating. Candidates can interview at their own pace, from anywhere, which often reduces anxiety compared to live panel interviews.

IntenX uses multi-factor evaluation models that analyze technical depth, communication clarity, confidence, and behavioral signals. Scores are consistent, data-driven, and aligned with role requirements‚Äîhelping recruiters make faster, better decisions.

Absolutely. IntenX follows enterprise-grade security standards, including encrypted data storage, secure access controls, and compliance with global data protection practices. Candidate data always remains confidential.

Yes. IntenX supports ATS and HR system integrations via APIs, allowing you to seamlessly plug AI interviews into your current hiring process without disrupting existing workflows.

Yes. IntenX is built to handle multiple languages and diverse accents, ensuring fair and accurate evaluations for global and multicultural talent pools.
